oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Modelling hydraulic conductivity in a small centrifuge
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SINGH, DN
GUPTA, AK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: clay liners
permeability
silty soil
hydraulic conductivity
centrifuge modelling
falling-head tests
consolidation tests
scale factor
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Hydraulic conductivity modelling has been carried out using various conventional laboratory 1g tests and centrifuge tests for different compaction states of a silty soil. It has been shown that hydraulic conductivity is modelled adequately in the centrifuge.
